mapper.select: select * from (select * from master_baby_storage_tbl where baby_id = #{baby_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by stor_date desc) where rownum = 1
mapper.insert: insert into master_baby_storage_tbl(STOR_ID, BABY_ID, STOR_DATE, STOR_KG, STOR_CM) values(seq_stor_id.nextval, #{baby_id}, #{stor_date}, #{stor_kg}, #{stor_cm})
mapper.select: select * from master_baby_storage_tbl where baby_id = #{id} and stor_date = #{date}
select * from MASTER_BABY_CARE_TBL where baby_id = #{baby_id} order by stor_date desc
select * from master_baby_storage_tbl where baby_id = #{baby_id} order by stor_date desc
